title: account hacked
body: My friend got "hacked" and he start sending people with the mysterygiftlol website, then i find out at the end it was not him that send the website, and i also find out that the website is not official. so my question is that i type my account on that website but i change the password at the end can they still get my account ?

replies.body: I'd still be sure to reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure someone hasn't already compromised your account. You'll be able to verify yourself as the original creator, and if anything happened those agents will be able to reverse the damage.
